text: Mba enser khaŋ na nzuai, “Kha bunai, nai guigi guarara. Kha nuianan ki gumgi gu mbigi, za ne khothɨgɨrga, ne nzerara. Fhe Bakɨme, ana Guma Bakɨme ma. Ana nduara won Ŋina Ŋaar ana won kamthooŋ gumgir ga ndɨɨv, ana won enser ga sarigim, ana zɨv, za mba vhemkora hɨgɨrga bigi ana ŋaari gumgi khɨvɨrga.”
